casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

May 16, 2005

[Cite as 05/16/2005 Case Announcements, 2005-Ohio-2352.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2005-0726. In Re Annexation of 259.15 Acres.

Lucas App. No. L-04-1042, 159 Ohio App.3d 736, 2005-Ohio-1027, 825 N.E.2d 238. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Pfeifer and O’Connor, JJ., dissent.
